ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Race of study subject
ValueRange: American Indian/Alaska Native; Asian; Hawaiian or Pacific Islander; Black or African American; White; More than one race; Unknown or not reported; Other Non-White; Other

ElementDescription: Ethnicity of participant
ValueRange: Hispanic or Latino; Not Hispanic or Latino; Unknown

ElementDescription: Highest level of education completed
Notes: 1 = Partial high school or equivalent; 2 = Completed high school or equivalent; 3 = Some post high school education (includes currently enrolled); 4 = Completed vocational or technical program; 5 = Completed undergraduate degree; 6 = Some post graduate education (includes currently enrolled); 7 = Completed graduate degree

ElementDescription: Marital Status
Notes: 1 = Single/never married; 2 = Married; 3 = Divorced; 4 = Separated; 5 = Living with someone as married; 6 = Widowed; 999 = Prefer not to say

ElementDescription: Estimated household income per year
Do you consider your sexual orientation to be:
Notes: 1 = Heterosexual or straight; 2 = Gay or lesbian; 3 = Bisexual; 4 = Questioning; 5 = Other please describe (text entry box); -2= Not collected at this time point; -3= Historical missing;  -7= Prefer not to say; -8= Unsure/Do not know; -9= Missing;-5=Item/Instrument not collected

ElementDescription: Do you consider your sexual orientation to be: Specify other
Currently employed
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -99= N/A ; 88= Missing ; 77= Refused; -999= Do not know

ElementDescription: If YES, are you currently employed, about how long have you worked at your current job or business?
Do you have any children?
Are you currently diagnosed with any medical disorders?
If yes to are you currently diagnosed with any medical disorders, please list your current medical diagnosis/diagnoses and approximate date of diagnosis/diagnoses, if known (text entry box)
Are you currently diagnosed with any psychological disorders?

If yes to are you currently diagnosed with any psychological disorders, please list your current psychological diagnosis/diagnoses and approximate date of diagnosis/diagnoses, if known (text entry box)
Have you ever been hospitalized for psychiatrics reasons?
If yes to have you ever been hospitalized for psychiatrics reasons, how many times have you been hospitalized for psychiatric reasons? (number entry box)
If yes to have you ever been hospitalized for psychiatrics reasons, date of last psychiatric hospitalization (text entry box MM/DD/YYYY).
Have you ever had any outpatient psychotherapy or counseling?
If yes to have you ever had any outpatient psychotherapy or counseling, how many total months of psychotherapy or counseling have you received? (number entry box)
Visit name
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2, Daily
